name: Who Likes A Challenge2 Trivia Game | Mixed 15 Questions | 15 Questions

questions.text: In which Disney film do you meet the characters Yzma, Pacha, Kuzco and Kronk?
At what time of the day did the RMS Titanic fatally hit an iceberg shattering her hull on the front starboard side?
Pu Yi was the last Emperor of China, and was crowned in 1908 at the age of ______ ?
Who wrote the books 'The Silent World' (1953) and 'The Living Sea (1963)?
Who is NOT a gargoyle in the Disney film 'The Hunchback of Notre Dame'?
Which country does NOT share a border with Brazil?
In 1952 Evita died and her nation mourned but how did she die?
What was the name of the absent-minded professor in Tintin?
How much prize money did French pilot Louis Bleriot receive from the London 'Daily Mail' when he became the first man to fly across the English Channel?
What nationality was Alec Issigonis who designed the 'Austin Rover Mini' first launched in 1959?
questions.explanation:
Turkish.

	Born in Smyrna, now Izmir

questions.text: How long were the pop stars allowed to perform at the 1985 'Live Aid' concert before being met with a traffic-light system warning them to vacate the stage for the next act?
In what year did Queen Elizabeth II of Britain describe her year of 'Annus Horribilis'?
questions.explanation:
1992.

	This was the year of separation and subsequent divorce of the 'Prince of Wales' and Lady Diana, the separation of Prince Andrew and his wife Sarah Ferguson and the fire in the apartments of Windsor Castle.

questions.text: Which flag did New Zealander Sir Edmund Hillary and Nepalese explorer Tenzing Norgay NOT leave at the summit of Everest?
Infamous John Christie was sentenced to death for the murder of four women in 1953 at 10 Rillington Place. Where in London was 10 Rillington Place?
questions.explanation:
Notting Hill.

	All of the four women were strangled and one was his wife. Hope you enjoyed the quiz.
